title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Elementary Mathematics Teaching Methods Linked to Reflective Practice Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three cases of Mathematical Knowledge for Teaching (MKT) application by analyzing elementary mathematics class videos
Learners can critically evaluate their own mathematics teaching methods and propose improvements through reflective journaling
Learners can develop elementary mathematics concept (e.g., division) instructional designs through PBL team activities and incorporate peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
